name: Jaiket - Trekking Fleece Jacket
description: A warm and lightweight fleece jacket that will protect you from the cold in the mountains. A staple in your backpack!

name: Kameej - Quick dry T-shirt BLACK
description: The fabric, made from recycled polyester, absorb and wicks away perspiration for a drier feeling. It dries more quickly than a cotton T-shirt.

name: Joote - Waterproof Hiking Boots
description: These hiking shoes have all you need for the mountains: a sole with excellent grip, a good fit with its waterproof Mid-height upper, a protective stone guard at the front and full cushioning.

name: Khambha - Mountain Trekking Pole
description: Simple yet very effective Push-pin adjustment system. Simply press the push-pin and off you go!

name: Bachaav - Emergency First Aid Kit
description: The kit's contents enable you to treat minor wounds or provide support in case of a sprain. The wide range is available in the case so you can complete it.

name: Botal - Water Bottle with Straw BLUE
description: Opens instantly with one hand, with a “straight head” pipette for drinking easily, transparent, solid, in durable plastic (0.8L). BPA free.

name: Renakot - Hiking Rain Poncho
description: This waterproof rain cape is the essential accessory for your hikes. Quick-to-put-on, it offers long-lasting protection from the rain, with or without a bag.

name: Disha - Orienteering Compass
description: Featuring a 360° rotating capsule, a compass, a ruler and a wrist strap, this small oil-filled compass will guide your first orienteering steps.

name: Thaila - Hiking Backpack
description: This hiking backpack offers optimal comfort with its padded waistband and ventilated back, equipped with AirCooling technology. It is equipped with secure pockets and a place for your water pouch.

name: Andkosh - Climbing Carabiner
description: The lightest safety carabiner. Made with aerospace grade materials.

name: Chattaan - Climbing Shoes GREY
description: Are you looking for a comfortable shoe with lots of grip? With its Vibram XS grip sole, this shoe is the answer.

name: Taul - Kettlebell
description: A friend to all floors, its rubber base softens impacts. Its ergonomic design provides an excellent grip and keeps you safe when you need to drop it.
